author: andyc
msg: Fixed some namespace related bugs. Thanks to Sandy Gao for

author: sandygao
msg: Fixed some small bugs. Now we can have a sequence of two elements.

author: neilg
msg: fix a bug reported by Nathan Beyer with regard to the detection of multiple includes of the same file.  This should also fix some problems with NPEs that some users have reported when using their own EntityResolvers in conjunction with <include>s and <import>s.

author: sandygao
msg: 2. Modified XSAttributeChecker, so that ID is checked within one document, instead of all documents.
3. Part of widlcard traversal is moved into XSAttributeChecker: so that we don't duplicate the code of tokenize the namespace attribute in both classes.
4. An allowNamespace method is added to XSWildcardDecl.
